About Me

Hello I'm Himanshu Goyal. I am from Meerut, U.P. India. I and now working in Pune city, India.
I pursued my B-tech. from IIT-Delhi and have graduaed in year 2017. From there I have joined CITIBank as a software analyst.
Currently I am working as a freeleancer for project in Machine-Learning and AI related field, with focus on financial domain problem. I think of myself as hardworking and passionate person with the ability to learn new things quickly. I like to meet new people and travel to new places.
